int main() {
    int a,b,mul,num;
    cin >> a >> b;
    mul = a*b;
    bool flag = true;
    while(mul!=0){
        num = mul%10;
        if(num != 0){
            cout << num;
            flag=false;
        }
        else if(!flag) cout << num;
        mul /=10;
    }
    return 0;
}

#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
#include <map>
#include <cctype>
#include <algorithm>

using namespace std;

struct node{
    string name;
    int score=0,number=0;
};

bool cmp(node a,node b){
    if(a.score!=b.score) return a.score>b.score;
    else if(a.number!=b.number) return a.number<b.number;
    else return a.name<b.name;
}

int main() {
    int n;
    cin >> n;
    map<string,int> cnt;
    map<string,float> s;
    vector<node> v;
    for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
        string tid,school;
        float score;
        cin >> tid >> score >> school;
        for(int j=0;j<school.length();j++)
        {
            school[j] = tolower(school[j]);
        }
        if(tid[0]=='A') s[school] += score;
        if(tid[0]=='B') s[school] += score/1.5;
        if(tid[0]=='T') s[school] += score*1.5;
        cnt[school]++;
    }
    for(auto it=s.begin();it!=s.end();it++){
        node no;
        no.name=it->first;
        no.number=cnt[no.name];
        no.score=it->second;
        v.push_back(no);
    }
    sort(v.begin(),v.end(),cmp);
    cout << v.size() << endl;
    int temp=-1;int Rank=1;
    for(int i=0;i<v.size();i++){
        if(v[i].score!=temp){
            Rank = i+1;
            temp = v[i].score;
        }
        cout << Rank << ' ' << v[i].name << ' ' << v[i].score << ' ' << v[i].number << endl;
    }
    return 0;
}

#include <iostream>

using namespace std;

int main() {
    int n,MAX=0,MIN=10000,maxid,minid;
    cin >> n;
    for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
        int id,x,y,length;
        cin >> id >> x >> y;
        length = x*x+y*y;
        if(length > MAX){
            MAX = length;
            maxid = id;
        }
        if(length < MIN){
            MIN = length;
            minid = id;
        }
    }
    printf("%04d %04d",minid,maxid);
    return 0;
}

#include <iostream>
#include <cctype>

using namespace std;

int main() {
    int n;
    scanf("%d\n",&n);
    for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
        string str;
        getline(cin,str);
        if(str.length() < 6){
            cout << "Your password is tai duan le." << endl;
            continue;
        }
        else{
            int j;
            bool number=true,alpha=true;
            for(j=0;j<str.length();j++){
                if(isdigit(str[j])) number=false;
                else if(isalpha(str[j])) alpha = false;
                else if(str[j]=='.') continue;
                else{
                    cout << "Your password is tai luan le." << endl;
                    break;
                }
            }
            if(j!=str.length()) continue;
            if(number){
                cout << "Your password needs shu zi." << endl;
                continue;
            }
            if(alpha){
                cout << "Your password needs zi mu." << endl;
                continue;
            }
            cout << "Your password is wan mei." << endl;
        }
    }
    return 0;
}

å¤§è‡´è¿‡ç¨‹ï¼š

è¿›è¡Œ10æ¬¡å¾ªç¯ï¼Œæ¯æ¬¡å…ˆå¯¹è¾“å…¥å­—ç¬¦ä¸²åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦ä¸ºå›æ–‡æ•°ï¼Œå¦‚æœæ˜¯åˆ™é€€å‡ºï¼Œå¦åˆ™ä¸‹ä¸€æ­¥

ç»“æŸå¾ªç¯ååˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦æ˜¯ä¸­é€”é€€å‡ºå¾ªç¯ï¼Œå¦‚æœæ˜¯åˆ™ç¬¦åˆå›æ–‡è¦æ±‚ï¼Œå¦åˆ™ä¸èƒ½å¾—åˆ°å›æ–‡æ•°

#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>

using namespace std;

int main() {
    string input,str;
    cin >> str;
    int i;
    for(i=0;i<10;i++){
        input = str;
        reverse(str.begin(),str.end());
        if(input == str){
            cout << input << " is a palindromic number.";
            break;
        }
        cout << input << " + ";

        cout << str << " = ";
        int up=0;str="";
        for(int j=0;j<input.length();j++){
            char c;
            int num=input[j]+input[input.length()-1-j]-2*'0'+up;
            c = num%10+'0';
            up = num/10;
            str = c+str;
        }
        if(up!=0) str = "1"+str;
        cout << str << endl;
    }
    if(i==10) cout << "Not found in 10 iterations.";
    return 0;
}

#include <cctype>

using namespace std;

int main() {
    char c;
    string s;
    int cnt=0;
    cin >> c;
    getchar();
    getline(cin,s);
    if(c=='C'){
        char temp = s[0];
        for(int i=1;i<s.length();i++){
            if(s[i]==temp) cnt++;
            else{
                if(cnt==0) cout << temp;
                else cout << cnt+1 << temp;
                temp = s[i];
                cnt = 0;
            }
        }
        if(cnt==0) cout << temp;
        else cout << cnt+1 << temp;
    }
    else{
        for(int i=0;i<s.length();i++){
            if(isdigit(s[i])) cnt = cnt*10 + s[i]-'0';
            else{
                cnt = cnt==0?1:cnt;
                for(int j=0;j<cnt;j++) cout << s[i];
                cnt = 0;
            }
        }
    }
    return 0;
}

#include <iostream>

using namespace std;

int main() {
    int n,m;
    scanf("%d %d",&n,&m);
    for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
        int teacher,cnt=0,MAX=0,MIN=m;
        float students=0;
        cin >> teacher;
        for(int j=0;j<n-1;j++){
            int score;
            cin >> score;
            if(score>=0&&score<=m){
                if(score > MAX) MAX = score;
                if(score < MIN) MIN = score;
                students += score;
                cnt++;
            }
        }
        int sum=(teacher+(students-MAX-MIN)/(cnt-2))/2+0.5;
        cout << sum << endl;
    }
    return 0;
}

#include <iostream>

using namespace std;

int main() {
    int n;
    scanf("%d",&n);
    for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
        scanf("\n");
        bool flag=false;
        for(int j=0;j<4;j++){
            char opt,ans;
            if(!flag){
                scanf("%c-%c",&opt,&ans);
                flag = true;
            }
            else scanf(" %c-%c",&opt,&ans);
            if(ans == 'T') printf("%d",opt-'A'+1);
        }
    }
    return 0;
}
